items.title: AAP Counters ACIP Guidance in New Immunization Schedule
items.description: Immunization schedule contravenes current federal guidance on COVID-19 immunization. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Fungal Meningitis Outbreak Traced to Epidurals From Mexico
items.description: Epidural anesthesia was the likely source of infections, half of which proved fatal. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Debate Over? RT vs Surgery in High-Risk Prostate Cancer
